old_text:
FROM python:3.9-slim
WORKDIR /app

COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install -r requirements.txt

COPY . .

CMD ["python", "app.py"]
new_text:
FROM python:3.9-slim
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

COPY . .

EXPOSE 8000

CMD ["gunicorn", "--bind", "0.0.0.0:8000", "app:app"]
